case.title: Clothes Shopping! - 38 (Central)
case.text:
I'm looking for a fun-loving girl who would enjoy being taken clothes shopping and having nice things bought for them. All I'm asking in return is the pleasure of your company and to see you try on and wear the clothes.
This is a completely genuine ad - I know it sounds a little unusual, but I've done this several times before and it has always been great fun for all concerned.
I'm an attractive, non-weird professional gentleman. You would be aged 18-40, good company, attractive, but not necessarily a "model type".
